armies.name: aeldari
armies.description: A sophisticated and ancient race with powerful psychic abilities.

armies.name: drukhari
armies.description: Dark and twisted kin of the Aeldari, reveling in pain and suffering.

armies.name: genestealers cults
armies.description: Insidious and secretive, infiltrating worlds to prepare them for the Tyranid invasion.

armies.name: leagues of votann
armies.description: Sturdy and pragmatic, relying on advanced technology and mining expertise.

armies.name: orks
armies.description: Brutal and savage, living for war and destruction.

armies.name: necrons
armies.description: Ancient and undying, their skeletal forms rising from their tomb worlds.

armies.name: tau empire
armies.description: Young and technologically advanced, seeking to bring the Greater Good to the galaxy.

armies.name: tyranids
armies.description: Hive-minded and voracious, consuming all biomass in their path.
